summary: Fighting against pirates at the turn of the 20th century, the Hong Kong navy are failing miserably. It's up to Sergeant Lung (Jackie Chan) to take matters into his own hands.
cast: Jackie Chan|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Biao Yuen|Dick Wei|Mars|Isabella Wong|Tai-Bo|Ng-Long Cheung|Hoi Sang Lee|Hoi-San Kwan|Wai Wong|Fat Wan|Yeong-Mun Kwon|Ho-Kai Law|Hark-Sun Lau|Wu Ma|Yun-Kin Chow|Qun Wang|Yen-Tsan Tang|Keung-Kuen Lai|David Thomas|Jennifer Paz|Michael Sorich|Danny Trejo|Joey Camen|Brad Sergi|Joe Hanna|Fred Tatasciore|John DeMita|Tom Konkle|Kurt Ferguson|Jeff Brunner|E.E. director: Directors: Jackie Chan, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung (uncredited)
title: Los piratas de los mares de China
